verses.verse: וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> become כִֽי־ <WH3588> shall be when יָבֹ֨אוּ <WH935> are come עָלֶ֜יךָ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> And it shall come to pass when all these things הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> of these הַבְּרָכָה֙ <WH1293> upon thee the blessing וְהַקְּלָלָ֔ה <WH7045> and the curse אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I have set לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> before וַהֲשֵׁבֹתָ֙ <WH7725> thee and thou shalt call אֶל־ <WH413> to לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <WH3824> [them] to mind בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among all the nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which הִדִּיחֲךָ֛ <WH5080> hath driven יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> whither the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> and you

וְשַׁבְתָּ֞ <WH7725> And shalt return עַד־ <WH5704> against יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֣ <WH8085> and shalt obey בְקֹל֔וֹ <WH6963> his voice כְּכֹ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> according to all that I command הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> thee this day אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you וּבָנֶ֔יךָ <WH1121> thou and thy children בְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> and with all thy soul

וְשָׁ֨ב <WH7725> will turn יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> That then the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁבוּתְךָ֖ <WH7622> thy captivity וְרִחֲמֶ֑ךָ <WH7355> and have compassion וְשָׁ֗ב <WH7725> upon thee and will return וְקִבֶּצְךָ֙ <WH6908> and gather מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> thee from all the nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after הֱפִֽיצְךָ֛ <WH6327> hath scattered יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> whither the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> in it

אִם־ <WH518> If יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become נִֽדַּחֲךָ֖ <WH5080> If [any] of thine be driven out בִּקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> unto the outmost הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> [parts] of heaven מִשָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> there יְקַבֶּצְךָ֙ <WH6908> gather יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> from thence will the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God וּמִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there יִקָּחֶֽךָ׃ <WH3947> thee and from thence will he fetch

וֶהֱבִֽיאֲךָ֞ <WH935> will bring יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> thee into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָרְשׁ֥וּ <WH3423> possessed אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1> which thy fathers וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <WH3423> and thou shalt possess וְהֵיטִֽבְךָ֥ <WH3190> it and he will do thee good וְהִרְבְּךָ֖ <WH7235> and multiply מֵאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1> thee above thy fathers

וּמָ֨ל <WH4135> will circumcise יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶת־ <WH853> לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> thine heart וְאֶת־ <WH853> לְבַ֣ב <WH3824> and the heart זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <WH2233> of thy seed לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <WH157> to love אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָבְךָ֥ <WH3824> with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> and with all thy soul לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> so חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> that thou mayest live

וְנָתַן֙ <WH5414> will put יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָל֖וֹת <WH423> all these curses הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these עַל־ <WH5921> upon אֹיְבֶ֥יךָ <WH341> upon thine enemies וְעַל־ <WH5921> and שֹׂנְאֶ֖יךָ <WH8130> and on them that hate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who רְדָפֽוּךָ׃ <WH7291> thee which persecuted

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you תָשׁ֔וּב <WH7725> And thou shalt return וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֖ <WH8085> and obey בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <WH6213> and do אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <WH4687> all his commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> thee this day

וְהוֹתִֽירְךָ֩ <WH3498> will make thee plenteous יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> in every work יָדֶ֗ךָ <WH3027> of thine hand בִּפְרִ֨י <WH6529> in the fruit בִטְנְךָ֜ <WH990> of thy body וּבִפְרִ֧י <WH6529> and in the fruit בְהֶמְתְּךָ֛ <WH929> of thy cattle וּבִפְרִ֥י <WH6529> and in the fruit אַדְמָתְךָ֖ <WH127> of thy land לְטוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> for good כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> will again יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> for the LORD לָשׂ֤וּשׂ <WH7797> rejoice עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> over לְט֔וֹב <WH2896> over thee for good כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he שָׂ֖שׂ <WH7797> as he rejoiced עַל־ <WH5921> over אֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1> over thy fathers

כִּ֣י <WH3588> if תִשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> If thou shalt hearken בְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <WH8104> to keep מִצְוֹתָיו֙ <WH4687> his commandments וְחֻקֹּתָ֔יו <WH2708> and his statutes הַכְּתוּבָ֕ה <WH3789> which are written בְּסֵ֥פֶר <WH5612> in this book הַתּוֹרָ֖ה <WH8451> of the law הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this כִּ֤י <WH3588> if תָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> [and] if thou turn אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> and with all thy soul פ

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <WH4687> For this commandment הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> thee this day לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor נִפְלֵ֥את <WH6381> it [is] not hidden הִוא֙ <WH1931> he מִמְּךָ֔ <WH4480> too וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor רְחֹקָ֖ה <WH7350> from thee neither [is] it far off הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

לֹ֥א <WH3808> not בַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> It [is] not in heaven הִ֑וא <WH1931> you should לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> that thou shouldest say מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> Who shall go up לָּ֤נוּ הַשָּׁמַ֙יְמָה֙ <WH8064> for us to heaven וְיִקָּחֶ֣הָ <WH3947> and bring לָּ֔נוּ וְיַשְׁמִעֵ֥נוּ <WH8085> it unto us that we may hear אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> וְנַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <WH6213> it and do

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor מֵעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> Neither [is] it beyond לַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> the sea הִ֑וא <WH1931> you should לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> that thou shouldest say מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> Who shall go לָ֜נוּ אֶל־ <WH413> about עֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> over הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> the sea וְיִקָּחֶ֣הָ <WH3947> for us and bring לָּ֔נוּ וְיַשְׁמִעֵ֥נוּ <WH8085> it unto us that we may hear אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> וְנַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <WH6213> it and do

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָר֥וֹב <WH7138> nigh אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> But הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> But the word מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> [is] very בְּפִ֥יךָ <WH6310> unto thee in thy mouth וּבִֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> and in thy heart לַעֲשֹׂתֽוֹ׃ <WH6213> that thou mayest do ס

רְאֵ֨ה <WH7200> See נָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> I have set לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> before הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> thee this day אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> life וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> and good וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּ֖וֶת <WH4194> and death וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָרָֽע׃ <WH7451> and evil

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֮ <WH6680> In that I command הַיּוֹם֒ <WH3117> thee this day לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <WH157> to love אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to walk בִּדְרָכָ֔יו <WH1870> in his ways וְלִשְׁמֹ֛ר <WH8104> and to keep מִצְוֹתָ֥יו <WH4687> his commandments וְחֻקֹּתָ֖יו <WH2708> and his statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֑יו <WH4941> and his judgments וְחָיִ֣יתָ <WH2421> that thou mayest live וְרָבִ֔יתָ <WH7235> and multiply וּבֵֽרַכְךָ֙ <WH1288> shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בָּאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> thee in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בָא־ <WH935> whither thou goest שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess

וְאִם־ <WH518> if יִפְנֶ֥ה <WH6437> turn away לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> But if thine heart וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and you will not תִשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> so that thou wilt not hear וְנִדַּחְתָּ֗ <WH5080> but shalt be drawn away וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֛יתָ <WH7812> and worship לֵאלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> other וַעֲבַדְתָּֽם׃ <WH5647> and serve

הִגַּ֤דְתִּי <WH5046> I denounce לָכֶם֙ הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> unto you this day כִּ֥י <WH3588> that אָבֹ֖ד <WH6> that ye shall surely תֹּאבֵד֑וּן <WH6> perish לֹא־ <WH3808> You will not תַאֲרִיכֻ֤ן <WH748> [and that] ye shall not prolong יָמִים֙ <WH3117> [your] days עַל־ <WH5921> in הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> upon the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you עֹבֵר֙ <WH5674> whither thou passest over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan לָבֹ֥א <WH935> to go שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess

הַעִידֹ֨תִי <WH5749> to record בָכֶ֣ם הַיּוֹם֮ <WH3117> this day אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> heaven וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָרֶץ֒ <WH776> and earth הַחַיִּ֤ים <WH2416> you life וְהַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> and death נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> against you [that] I have set לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before הַבְּרָכָ֖ה <WH1293> blessing וְהַקְּלָלָ֑ה <WH7045> and cursing וּבָֽחַרְתָּ֙ <WH977> therefore choose בַּֽחַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> life לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> order תִּחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> may live אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you וְזַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <WH2233> that both thou and thy seed

לְאַֽהֲבָה֙ <WH157> That thou mayest love אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> [and] that thou mayest obey בְּקֹל֖וֹ <WH6963> his voice וּלְדָבְקָה־ <WH1692> and that thou mayest cleave ב֑וֹ כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ה֤וּא <WH1931> this חַיֶּ֙יךָ֙ <WH2416> unto him for he [is] thy life וְאֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> and the length יָמֶ֔יךָ <WH3117> of thy days לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> that thou mayest dwell עַל־ <WH5921> in הָאֲדָמָ֗ה <WH127> in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1> unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> and to Jacob לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like פ
